comment.author: 33482043@N07
comment._content: I see no depth in this "stereo pair"

comment.author: 63637650@N00
comment._content: There is a very small amount of parallax between the views but virtually no 3D effect because the scene has no objects in the foreground.  Even so I take my hat off to the pioneers of 3D photography.  It's rare that you see a 'dud' like this.
